Package com.teama.pds

Class Summary
ActionNode Author: Grant Kurtz

The module that will act as our Producer-Consumer; consuming input from one or more input queues, and dumping finalized information into output queues, of which future ActionNode's may consume from.
AddressBook Author: Grant Kurtz Stores all customer information in a convenient wrapper class.
AuthTokenSingleton Author: Matthew Frey A token of authentication singleton Note: This is just a hack for now, Jason.
AuthView Author: Matthew Frey, This will be a short-lived frame for handling authentication.
Chef Author: Grant Kurtz The Controller that handles preparing food, and where needed, will move food that is prepared to the oven for cooking, if need be.
Commander Author: Grant Kurtz Maintains the requirement of calling each ActionNode in sequence, guaranteeing that the ActionNode is only executed once, in FIFO order.
Controller Author: Jason Greaves Handles all of the history recordings, customer addings, addressbook modding, and passes information from the view to the model and vice versa.
CookedItem Author: Grant Kurtz This entity holds relevant information for items that need to be cooked in an oven.
Customer Author: Grant Kurtz An Entity class that maintains state information for a given customer who has placed an order in our system.
Delivery Author: Grant Kurtz The Delivery controller keeps the fleet of vehicles that move all orders from the store to the colleges.
FoodItem Author: Grant Kurtz The base information necessary to represent a single piece of food.
FriedItem Author: Grant Kurtz
Fries Author: Grant Kurtz
Fryer Author: Grant Kurtz
History Author: Grant Kurtz Is used as a logger for all events performed by the system.
HotWings Author: Grant Kurtz
Kitchen Author: Grant Kurtz Handles delegating unprepared food items to available chefs, as well as ensuring the ovens and chefs are keeping an eye on their food to keep everything moving.
Location User: Ryan Brown Handles receiving, putting trucks into delivery mode, and then returning trucks to the pizza shop.
Model Author: Grant Kurtz, Matthew Frey, Svyatoslav Sivov The Model controller maintains the entire state of the simulation.
Order Authors: Grant Kurtz, Svyatoslav Sivov An Entity class that maintains the orders as placed by a customer
Oven Author: Grant Kurtz
OverSeer Author: Grant Kurtz Used to Modify, Cancel, and View orders currently in the system.
PDSys Author: Matthew Frey This is the main class for starting the system
PeekResourceList<T extends Resource> Author: Grant Kurtz This is a special class that is used in cases where the stored resources never need to be removed from the queue, but you need dynamic updating of the queue each time the queue is accessed.
PizzaItem Author: Grant Kurtz, Jason Greaves Stores all information necessary to represent a pizza.
PizzaMenu Author: Jason Greaves Creates a menu that takes in FoodItems and CookedItems that are gettable.
Record Author: Grant Kurtz An Entity class for storing an event that happened in the simulation.
Resource Author: Grant Kurtz A base entity class that is the backbone of the producer/consumer model of this whole project.
ResourceList<T extends Resource> Author: Grant Kurtz Maintains a list of objects extending Resource, with a PriorityQueue as the backing data structure.
Scheduler Author: Grant Kurtz Manages all ResourceLists in the program.
StoreConfiguration User: Jason Greaves

Sets the configuration from a .properties file to use for our pds.
Time Author: Grant Kurtz An Singleton Entity class that maintains the current time for the entire simulation.
TimeReader Author: Grant Kurtz This Entity class is just used as a separation of privileges, so as to avoid a chef accidentally altering the time without given the rest of the simulation a chance to update.
Truck Author: Grant Kurtz The Entity class that acts to "transport" orders from the store to the customer's location.
View_CLI Author: Matthew Frey, Svyatoslav Sivov This class will be the Command Line Interface (CLI) for our Model Should be interchangeable with future GUI views.
View_GUI Author: Matthew Frey, This class will be the Graphical User Interface for our Model Should be interchangeable with CLI
 

Enum Summary
PizzaItem.Size Pizza sizes
PizzaItem.Topping Valid toppings for the pizza
Record.Status Used for standardizing the icons that are printed alongside messages.
 

Exception Summary
AlreadyCookingOrderException Author: Grant Kurtz
AlreadyInstantiatedException Author: Grant Kurtz
NotEnoughSpaceException Author: Grant Kurtz
NotInstantiatedException Author: Grant Kurtz
SimulationAlreadyRunningException Author: Grant Kurtz
